Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Unit
      • Player

  • public class Player
extends Unit
    Represents the Player object, which is users controlled using keyboard input.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int startX, int startY)
      Create a Player and set it's initial map position, and initial combat stats

      • canAttack

        public void canAttack(int[] input,
                      int delta)
        Determines if Player can attack, setting appropriate flags as required
        Parameters:
        input - array of keyboard inputs
        delta - time passed since last frame (milliseconds)

      • reset

        public void reset(boolean afterDeath)
        Reset the initial load values for Player
        Parameters:
        afterDeath - indicates if the Player has just died

      • update

        public void update(World world,
                   int[] input,
                   int delta)
        Update the game state for a frame
        Parameters:
        world - the world the Player is in
        input - array of keyboard inputs
        delta - time passed since last frame (milliseconds)
